segments.text: Would you be willing to meet the extra cost if we meet your additional requirements ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , if you can meet our deadline .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That shouldn't be a problem , as long as we can make ends meet .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I also hope your quality will meet our standard .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: We never fail to meet our client's expectation .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Excellent . We will meet all your conditions if you can meet our demands .
segments.speaker: S2
